articles.title: Death toll rises to 43 in Texas floods as rescuers scour for missing
articles.description: Severe flash floods in central Texas have resulted in at least 43 fatalities. Rescue operations are ongoing as authorities search for missing individuals.

articles.title: Court rulings favor Big Tech in AI copyright cases
articles.description: U.S. courts have largely sided with companies like Anthropic, Google, Meta, OpenAI, and Microsoft, ruling that publicly posted content can be used to train AI.

articles.title: USMNT has one goal vs. Mexico in Gold Cup final: ‘Lift a trophy’
articles.description: The U.S. Men's National Team aims to secure a victory against Mexico in the Gold Cup final, focusing on winning the championship trophy.
